00043 #ifndef _FREEBUS_DEBUG_H
00044 #define _FREEBUS_DEBUG_H
00045 
00046 #include <avr/pgmspace.h>
00047 
00048 #ifdef DEBUG_LCD
00049 #include "lcd-lib.h"
00051 #define DEBUG_INIT(x) lcd_init(LCD_CLEAR)
00052 
00053 #define DEBUG_PUTC(x) lcd_putc(x)
00054 
00055 #define DEBUG_PUTC_BLOCKING(x)
00056 
00057 #define DEBUG_PUTS(x) lcd_puts(x)
00058 
00059 #define DEBUG_PUTS_BLOCKING(x)
00060 
00061 #define DEBUG_DIGIT(x) lcd_digit(x)
00062 
00063 #define DEBUG_PUTHEX(x) lcd_hex(x)
00064 
00065 #define DEBUG_PUTHEX_BLOCKING(x)
00066 
00067 #define DEBUG_NEWLINE(x) lcd_putc(' ')
00068 
00069 #define DEBUG_NEWLINE_BLOCKING()
00070 
00071 #define DEBUG_SPACE() 
00072 
00073 #define DEBUG_SPACE_BLOCKING()
00074 
00075 #elif defined DEBUG_UART
00076 #include "uart.h"
00078 #define DEBUG_INIT(x) uart_init()
00079 
00080 #define DEBUG_PUTC(x) uart_putc(x)
00081 
00082 #define DEBUG_PUTC_BLOCKING(x) uart_putc_blocking(x)
00083 
00084 #define DEBUG_PUTS(x) uart_puts(PSTR(x))
00085 
00086 #define DEBUG_PUTS_BLOCKING(x) uart_puts_blocking(PSTR(x))
00087 
00088 #define DEBUG_PUTHEX(x) uart_hex(x)
00089 
00090 #define DEBUG_PUTHEX_BLOCKING(x) uart_hex_blocking(x)
00091 
00092 #define DEBUG_NEWLINE() uart_newline()
00093 
00094 #define DEBUG_NEWLINE_BLOCKING() uart_newline_blocking()
00095 
00096 #define DEBUG_SPACE() uart_putc(' ')
00097 
00098 #define DEBUG_SPACE_BLOCKING() uart_putc_blocking(' ')
00099 
00100 #else
00101 
00102 #define DEBUG_INIT(x)
00103 
00104 #define DEBUG_PUTC(x)
00105 
00106 #define DEBUG_PUTC_BLOCKING(x)
00107 
00108 #define DEBUG_PUTS(x)
00109 
00110 #define DEBUG_PUTS_BLOCKING(x)
00111 
00112 #define DEBUG_PUTDIGIT(x)
00113 
00114 #define DEBUG_PUTHEX(x)
00115 
00116 #define DEBUG_PUTHEX_BLOCKING(x)
00117 
00118 #define DEBUG_NEWLINE(x)
00119 
00120 #define DEBUG_NEWLINE_BLOCKING()
00121 
00122 #define DEBUG_SPACE() 
00123 
00124 #define DEBUG_SPACE_BLOCKING()
00125 #endif

00127 #ifdef DEBUG_TIMING
00128 #define DEBUG_PIN1_ON(x)            SETPIN_IO1(1)     
00129 #define DEBUG_PIN1_OFF(x)           SETPIN_IO1(0)     
00130 #define DEBUG_PIN2_ON(x)            SETPIN_IO2(1)     
00131 #define DEBUG_PIN2_OFF(x)           SETPIN_IO2(0)     
00132 #define DEBUG_PIN3_ON(x)            SETPIN_IO3(1)     
00133 #define DEBUG_PIN3_OFF(x)           SETPIN_IO3(0)

00135 #define DEBUG_PIN4_OFF(x)           SETPIN_IO4(0)

00137 #define DEBUG_PIN5_OFF(x)           SETPIN_IO5(0)

00143 #define DEBUG_PIN8_OFF(x)           SETPIN_IO8(0)     
00144 #else
